node.title: Travel to Cherrapunji, Meghalaya, India
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Cherrapunji is a subdivisional town in the East Khasi Hills district in the Indian state of Meghalaya. 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTkUzQibabmonM44DguwhRRRQk1YCBRVT8tmDdjc5TcGC/image.png)

node.title: I will give you free SBD,Steem Dollar just for resteeming and upvoting
node.author: mozammel14
node.body:
Well, Today Happy Friendship Day , so I have decided to go ahead and give away (at least) 0.001 SBD to all my active followers
![DQmUMDrdkrJGqsrdCRGXCuPdcqd15kowgs3DjzokmEqjPbf_1680x8400.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPPyMPyj3DVc9QNXUNTdniqv6E9HgaJFf2HBCgT5EWvAQ/DQmUMDrdkrJGqsrdCRGXCuPdcqd15kowgs3DjzokmEqjPbf_1680x8400.jpg)


All you have to do to prove you are an active follower is:

1: Follow (if you aren't already following) for 0.001 SBD
AND/OR
2: Upvote for an additional 0.001 SBD (with 100% voting power use)

3: Resteem for an additional 0.001 SBD

4: Comment to let me know which of the above you wish to claim.

You can check my Wallet history to verify that people are being paid:
https://steemit.com/@mozammel14/transfers

Thanks to all my loyal followers for sticking with me thus far in my Steemit journey.
